Project Proponent: Bulgoo Pastoral Pty Ltd as The Trustee for Bulgoo Pastoral Unit Trust
Project Name: Bulgoo Station Native Forest Protection Project
Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Avoided Deforestation 1.1) Methodology Determination 2015
Project Description: This project protects the native forest from being deforested (cleared) and the land from being converted to an agricultural system, where a clearing permit was issued before 1 July 2010.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
3000/DP765199, 4902/DP765199, 1715/DP763473, 4901/DP765199



This project is in the Cobar local government area.
Is the project area or project areas sub: There is no carbon maintenance obligation on this project area
Name of person/s to whom the KACCUs issu: George Henry Yench; Bulgoo Pastoral Pty Ltd as the Trustee for Bulgoo Pastoral Unit Trust
Notes:
18/05/2015 Variation of project method - from the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Avoided Deforestation) Methodology Determination 2013 to the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Avoided Deforestation 1.1) Methodology Determination 2015.

13/07/2022 Variation to participant name - from George Yench and Beverly Yench to Bulgoo Pastoral Pty Ltd as The Trustee for Bulgoo Pastoral Unit Trust.
